organization.content:

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Organization" entities:

1. Australian national rugby league team (also known as the Kangaroos or the Wallabies)
2. Rugby League Australia (the governing body of rugby league in Australia)
3. New South Wales Rugby League (the governing body of rugby league in New South Wales)
4. Queensland Rugby League (the governing body of rugby league in Queensland)
5. Australian Rugby League Commission (the governing body of rugby league in Australia)

These entities are mentioned in the paragraph as follows:

1. "Australia" - This refers to the Australian national rugby league team.
2. "Rugby League Australia" - This is the governing body of rugby league in Australia.
3. "New South Wales Rugby League" - This is the governing body of rugby league in New South Wales.
4. "Queensland Rugby League" - This is the governing body of rugby league in Queensland.
5. "Australian Rugby League Commission" - This is the governing body of rugby league in Australia.
